Hi,
I've been noticing that a crawl job will just stall out.  CPU and RAM a=
re not maxed out or anything but the Toe Thread report makes it look like m=
aybe all 50 threads are locked.  (I've pasted the report below with the maj=
ority of the middle snipped out since they are all basically the same).  I =
found this issue [https://webarchive.jira.com/browse/HER-1609?page=3Dcom.at=
lassian.jira.plugin.system.issuetabpanels%3Achangehistory-tabpanel] and am =
wondering if this issue describes the behavior that I'm seeing.  Can anybod=
y confirm this?  If not, is there something else I'm doing wrong?  And if s=
o, does anybody know when will 1.14.4 be released?

Thanks,
Brent
